properties.name: integration.test.enabled
properties.description: Used to denote whether currently an integration test is executed. Can then be used to mock certain beans.

properties.name: thanlinardos.springenterpriselibrary.secrets.refresh.enabled
properties.description: True if the secrets should be refreshed depending on the value of {secrets.refresh-interval-ms}.

properties.name: thanlinardos.springenterpriselibrary.secrets.refresh-interval-ms
properties.description: The interval to refresh the application's secrets in milliseconds.

properties.name: thanlinardos.springenterpriselibrary.angular-ui.url
properties.description: The URL where the Angular UI is hosted. This is used to set the CORS allowed origins in {com.thanlinardos.spring_enterprise_library.spring_cloud_security.security.SecurityCommonConfig}.

properties.name: thanlinardos.springenterpriselibrary.oauth2.keycloak.token
properties.description: Defines the token type (JWT or Opaque) that the resource server should expect from Keycloak.

properties.name: thanlinardos.springenterpriselibrary.oauth2.client-certificate-path-format
properties.description: Defines the path format where to find client certificates for OAuth2 client authentication.

properties.name: thanlinardos.springenterpriselibrary.secrets.refresh.displayValues
properties.description: True if the refreshed secret values should be displayed in the logs. Used in spring enterprise library secrets refresh feature.
